account_state.rejected_title: Your Account Application on "Doctor Friend" has been Rejected
account_state.rejection_text:
Dear {name}, 

We hope you are well. We regret to inform you that, after careful review, your account application on "Doctor Friend" has been rejected. 

We understand that this may be disappointing, and we want to assure you that the decision was based on specific criteria. If additional information is needed or if you believe a mistake has been made, please feel free to contact us for discussion. 

We appreciate your interest in "Doctor Friend" and hope to serve your needs in future opportunities. 

Sincerely, 

Doctor Friend Team
account_state.analysis_text:
Hello {name}, 

We would like to inform you that your account on "Doctor Friend" is currently under review. Our team is reviewing your information to ensure a safe and efficient experience. 

You will receive a notification once the review is complete. We appreciate your patience and understanding. 

If you need assistance or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. 

Sincerely, 

Doctor Friend Team
